author: weaver
msg: added a no-arg start method for use within the Spring lifecycle.

author: weaver
msg: Engine now has a single implementation which just accepts a ComponentMananger.
The PortletContainer is no longer manually started by the Engine as it is now being started within Spring.
JetspeedServlet now constructs the ComponentManager along with the Engine.
AbstractEngine is no longer need sine the ComponentManager is configured outside the engine.
